alert.note: Alert for Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 2:15PM EDT until June 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL POLK COUNTY... At 215 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Auburndale to near Winter Haven to 6 miles southeast of Jan Phyl Village, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Poinciana, Winter Haven, Haines City, Lake Wales, Auburndale, Lake Alfred, Dundee, Davenport, and Eagle Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
